name: Apollo Tools 79-Piece General Tool Set
description: The Apollo Tools 79-Piece General Tool Set is the perfect addition to any household. This comprehensive set includes all the tools you need for most small repairs around the house. The tools are heat treated and chrome plated to resist corrosion and ensure durability. This set includes a claw hammer, long nose pliers, adjustable wrench, precision screwdrivers, and more. The tools come neatly organized in a sturdy blow-molded case for easy storage and transportation. Whether you're hanging a picture, assembling furniture, or doing minor repairs, this tool set provides the essential tools you'll need.

name: WORKPRO 125-Piece Home Repair Tool Kit
description: The WORKPRO 125-Piece Home Repair Tool Kit is an ideal set for any DIY enthusiast or homeowner. This extensive kit includes a wide variety of tools to tackle most home repair and maintenance tasks. It features a durable claw hammer, a set of pliers, a tape measure, screwdrivers, hex keys, a utility knife, and more. All tools are made from high-quality steel and finished in chrome to resist rust and corrosion. The tools are housed in a sturdy case that keeps everything organized and easily accessible. This tool kit is perfect for general home maintenance and repair tasks, offering everything you need to get the job done efficiently.
